awd_titl_txt: Group Travel of U.S. Participants Attending XIII            International Congress of Phonetic Sciences (19-24 August   1991) in Aix-en-Province, France
awd_abstract_narration: This action is to support the travel costs of American scientists               to attend the XIII International Congress of Phonetic Sciences.                 The meeting will be held in Aix-en Province, France, August 19 -                24, 1991.  This international meeting brings together leading                   scientists from around the world to present their data and                      discuss ideas on phonetics, speech synthesis, phonology,                        perception and cognitive processes.  This congress should be very               rewarding since it provides a congenial atmosphere for the                      sharing and exchange of scientific ideas and information.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: Division of Behavioral and Cognitive Sciences
